fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 119.44 lakh crore compared with Rs 80.57 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 85.60 points or 0.48% to settle at 17,770.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, jumped 7.33% to 13.68. Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone and Reliance Industries were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
